--Best experienced in fullscreen--

--- CONTROLS ---

MOVEMENT :  WASD/ZQSD/CONTROLLER LSTICK/DPAD

AIM :  MOUSE / CONTROLLER RSTICK

SHOOT : MOUSE CLICK / CONTROLLER RIGHT SHOULDER (R1/RB/R)

---SYNOPSIS---

You're a poison master who comes to Malicia, a classic town, because you heard someone made a new deadly poison and you want to add it to your collection of poisons

     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     -----     ----- 

Try to survive and go as far as you can with some upgrades Buff your poison, your throwing skill and your survivability to challenge the Mayor of the city
